data.title: Chichibu Manyu Ticket
data.meta_description: Information about Chichibu Manyu Ticket is provided. Take the SEIBU RAILWAY and COME SEE SEIBU!
data.text:
Notice

Service is suspended on some portions of the Seibu Sightseeing Bus route

on which the Chichibu Discount Ticket Manyu Marutoku Coupon can be used.

Check the Seibu Bus website or other sources for the latest information before departure.

Route: Seibu Sightseeing Bus, Route M/Nagatsugawa Line

Suspended portion: between Kawamata and Nagatsugawa bus stops (the portion between the Seibu Chichibu Station and Kawamata bus stops is in service)

Period of suspension: resumption of service to be determined

Reason for suspension: road impassible due to a landslide

Chichibu Manyu Ticket

This fare combines a round-trip ticket from a Seibu departure station to Seibu-Chichibu station(SI36) with a Manyu Marutoku Coupon that can be used at Seibu Chichibu Ekimae Onsen Matsurinoyu or for bus or car rental (one of six choices). Show your Manyu Marutoku Coupon to receive discounts at participating facilities and shops in the Chichibu area.

Manyu Marutoku Coupon

At Seibu Chichibu Ekimae Onsen Matsurinoyu!

(1) As a ticket to enter the hot springs area

(2) As a meal coupon in the food court

(3) As a shopping coupon in the shopping area

On Chichibu area buses!

(4) Two days' unlimited use of Chichibu zone buses

(5) Express bus to Mitsumine Shrine (one-way only)

At the Seibu-Chichibu station office of Toyota Rent a Lease Saitama!

* Advance reservations required.

(6) Special rates on car rental

Use at Seibu Chichibu Ekimae Onsen Matsurinoyu

(1) As a ticket to enter the hot springs area

Adult/child: One Manyu Marutoku Coupon may be used to enter the hot springs area once.

* Does not include rental of face towels, bath towels, and spa wear or use of bedrock bath or premium lounge facilities.

*Cannot be used for bathing in the early morning on weekends, holidays, or mornings on the days after certain holidays.

Towel rental (face towel and bath towel): Available for 100 yen when admitted using a Manyu Marutoku Coupon.

(2) As a meal coupon in the food court

Adult: One Manyu Marutoku Coupon may be used as a 950-yen meal coupon.

Child: One Manyu Marutoku Coupon may be used as a 480-yen meal coupon.

* If ordering a meal in excess of the above amount, please pay the difference yourself.

* No refunds will be provided if ordering a meal for less than the above amount.

To use the Manyu Marutoku Coupon in the food court, please order your desired items from the menu at the Oyatsu Hompo cashier's counter.

To use it at Yakiniku Horyaien, please order from the staff at the Horyaien cashier's counter.

(3) As a shopping coupon in the shopping area

Adult: One Manyu Marutoku Coupon may be used as a 950-yen shopping coupon.

Child: One Manyu Marutoku Coupon may be used as a 480-yen shopping coupon.

* Not accepted by some stores.

* If your purchase exceeds the above amount, please pay the difference yourself.

* No refunds will be provided if your purchase is less than the above amount.

Riding Chichibu area buses (Seibu Sightseeing Buses only)

(4) In exchange for a Two-day Bus Pass for the Chichibu zone

Exchange for a Two-day Bus Pass at the Chichibu office of Seibu Sightseeing Bus in front of Seibu-Chichibu station.

(5) As a one-way ticket on the express bus to Mitsumine Shrine

Can be used for an express bus ride from the Seibu-Chichibu station bus stop to the Mitsumine Shrine bus stop or from the Mitsumine Shrine bus stop to the Seibu-Chichibu station bus stop. Please hand the Manyu Marutoku Coupon directly to the bus driver when boarding the bus.

Renting a car from Seibu-Chichibu station

(6) As a coupon for special car-rental rates at the Seibu-Chichibu station office of Toyota Rent a Lease Saitama.

* Reservations must be made at least two days prior to the date of use. (May be unavailable depending on the number of reservations already made.)

For reservations/inquiries contact: Toyota Rent a Lease Saitama Seibu-Chichibu station office

Tel.: (0494) 25-0100

Business Hours: 8:00-20:00

Closed: January 1, December 3

Click here for a list of special car-rental rates（in Japanese）（PDFを開く）

Buying a Chichibu Manyu Ticket

Sale period Yearlong Sale date

Ticket vending machines: First day of use (from first train to 16:00)

Counters: From one month prior to first day of use

Valid period From two days prior to first day of use (the Chichibu Manyu Ticket will be collected at the final station of your trip)

Tourist Helpdesk

Price

Click here for prices （in Japanese）（PDFを開く）
